snippet: The 2,500 rupee (about $47) Aakash tablet computer has generated huge excitement among gadget fans and internationally renowned columnists alike and appears to have sold out within days. But it has been dogged by complaints about its performance and...
abstract: The 2,500 rupee (about $47) Aakash tablet computer has generated huge excitement among gadget fans and internationally renowned columnists alike and appears to have sold out within days. But it has been dogged by complaints about its performance and delivery delays.

headline.main: India Ink: Aakash Tablet is Oversold but Underperforming
